channel.title: FIDtenas | Open-source RF hardware for Amateur Radio
channel.description: Recent content on FIDtenas | Open-source RF hardware for Amateur Radio

item.title: Pablo EA1FID Álvarez
item.description: Telecommunications engineer by the Universidad Politécnica de Madrid and Ham Radio operator (callsign EA1FID) since an early age. Large experience in antenna design thanks to his job at the Microwaves and Radar Group of the Signals, Systems and Radiocommunications Deppartment of this university.

item.title: Project Aiga: a portable VHF/UHF antenna optimised for satellite work
item.description: Today, we are glad to present you a very special antenna: Aiga. Aiga is a double band VHF/UHF antenna designed for portable use.

item.title: About
item.description: From FIDtenas, we seek to develop RF hardware using the most advanced state-of-the-art techniques to freely offer updated and optimized designs to radio amateurs and radio communications enthusiasts.
